faq.sectionSubtitle: Have questions about our AI automation services?

timeline.question: How long does AI automation implementation take?
timeline.answer: Depending on project scope, it takes 2 weeks to 2 months. Simple task automation can be done within 2 weeks, while complex system builds may take longer.

automation.question: What tasks can be automated?
automation.answer: Most rule-based repetitive tasks can be automated, including data entry, report generation, customer inquiry handling, schedule management, and email classification.

pricing.question: How is pricing determined?
pricing.answer: After understanding requirements through a free coffee chat, we provide custom quotes based on project scope. You can choose between fixed costs and monthly subscription models.

integration.question: Is integration with existing systems possible?
integration.answer: Yes, API integration with most SaaS services and internal systems is possible. We integrate with various tools including Slack, Notion, Google Workspace, and Salesforce.

coffeeChat.question: How does the coffee chat work?
coffeeChat.answer: It's a 30-minute video meeting where we understand your current workflow and automation needs. After the meeting, we send you a customized proposal.

cta.title: Not sure where to start with AI automation?
cta.subtitle: Get AI automation strategy consulting tailored to your business with a free 30-minute coffee chat.
